description.p: ROS Industrial support for the Motoman sda5f.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman sda5f manipulators.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online http://www.motoman.com/datasheets/sda5f.pdf All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
